attributes.title: UVI
attributes.description:
Ultraviolet Index – risk of harm from unprotected sun exposure due to the strength of sunburn-producing ultraviolet (UV) radiation; 
0 - 2 low
3 - 5 moderate
6 - 7 high
8 - 10 very high
11+ extreme
